idea-plugin.name: Competitive Program Parser
idea-plugin.description:
Competitive Programming parser - Mind Sport
You should have Mind Sport IntelliJ Plugin installed for this to work.
Pre-requisites: 1. Install Mind sport IntelliJ Plugin 2. Open https://github.com/tgvdinesh/java-template project in IntelliJ
Steps: 1. Open https://github.com/tgvdinesh/java-template local project in IntelliJ. 2. Open Competitive programming challenge. Eg: Hacker Rank, Code Chef, etc. The list of supported websites are given here. https://github.com/tgvdinesh/chelper-companion#supported-websites 3. Click on Mind sport chrome extension shown on top of chrome browser. 4. That's all. You'll now see that the plugin will have replaced your io.json file and you are ready to solve the problem.
PS: You should have opened java-template project in IntelliJ or it should at least be open previously for this plugin to work.
